Description:
A professional and elite fresh market shop in Dabouq called (Yasmina Fruits and Vegetables) is hiring a supervisor to supervise the shop and handle cahsier on daily basis from 10:00am until 6:00pm. The position is offered Preferably for STUDENTS whom are looking for a job after studies.The job requires you to:Handle Cashier 
Supervise the shop and arrange the fruits and vegetables. 
Help customers during their shopping experience.The appilicant shallBe only a Male University student
Professional in dealing with customers and management 
Take care of the shop and maintan cleanness of the shop
Handle some logistics with prepartion of orders and delivery orders
Able to speak English
Have basic computer skills, familiar with WhatsApp functionalities and similar skills. Most preferrably lives in the area or close like in Dabouq, Khalda, Al Kursi, Bayader and near by areas.Skills
Skills:
The applicant shall know how to use basic computer skills and WhatsApp
Knows how to deal with customers
